Emma Johnson

I've successfully updated our emmajohnson/image_transformation repository as requested. I've downloaded the image attachments from your email and uploaded them to the images/ directory in the repository.

The changes have been pushed to GitHub, and the images (cat.jpg, bird.jpg, and train.jpg) are now available in the repository.

Let me know if you need anything else.

Best regards,
Emma
